name: Your Pinguin
description:
If you love penguins, "Your Penguin" is a fantastic app for you, created with the Unreal Engine. 

It include:

  • Fully rigged 3D model of a cute penguin.
  • Some small animation events
  • Scene, lighting and animation controls 
  • Programm is coded with Unreal Engine Blueprints

 
Have fun to play with the Pinguin :)


Privat Message: Jojo have fun :)
